title: Life And Love After Being 'The Fattest Man In The World'
teaser: How Paul Mason lost hundreds of pounds and moved from England to Massachusetts is a story of abuse, celebrity and Skype.
contentencoded:
In the western Massachusetts town of Orange, a man from England is counting the days before he gets a surgery that will greatly improve his life.

But it may or may not happen before he has to leave the country.

How he got to western Massachusetts is a story of abuse, celebrity and Skype. New England Public Radio’s Jill Kaufman has our story.
